channel.title: Trade Abilities for Admins and Player rights?
channel.description: Hey, I'm running PI 317, and I'd like to set so some admins can't trade, but it's not coded in unless I can't find it. Can someone give me the coding for it? or help me find it.

item.title: Trade Abilities for Admins and Player rights?
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Trade has been disabled for Administrators!"); return; }

Find that in Trade.java, if not there, then add it in.

Then go to Config.java and Look for

Find it, then change the true part, to false.

Then compile, and your done.

Read full topic
item.source: Trade Abilities for Admins and Player rights?
